channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 28–30 March 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 17–22 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 25–27 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 2–6 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • UK Independence Party (ENF): 11–17 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 28–30 March 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 28–30 March 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 22.2–25.9%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 28.0–32.0%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 8.8–11.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3.2–4.9%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.6–1.5%
  • UK Independence Party (ENF): 16.4–19.7%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.9–9.3%
